Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory164.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Is it really that easy? We simply arrived at the Demon General's Castle by destroying the Demons along the way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "There weren't any split paths. Some looked like open roads, but there were invisible barriers.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "It's easier this way. When Kamui was playing games, I often wanted to stop him from doing all those repetitive side quests.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Like the errand quests you talked about?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Some were even refreshed on a daily basis. I mean, they were all single player games, so what was the point of these boring tasks? What were those designers thinking?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'They just wanted to keep the players occupied, I guess.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Talking like real game designers, the trio completely ignored the traps in the castle and continued walking forward.'}
{3: 'Not like they could easily find where the traps were.'}
{3: "They didn't even care if the traps were triggered or not."}
{3: 'According to Camu, this was called "HP management", which was often used by Kamui when he played games.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'In RPGs, traps usually do not kill the player instantly. So as long as we keep using recovery potions, we can step on as many traps as we like.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The key to this method is recovery potions, which they just got a lot by killing monsters.'}
{3: 'I watched their HP bars turning from green to red, then green again.'}
{3: '—What a boring way to play.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I see a hall in front. There shouldn't be any more traps, right?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Karenina stormed through the trap area, followed by Camu and Vera.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hurry up, Gray Raven. This is obviously a plot that is only triggered when all the team members have arrived.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Be right there.', 3: '23', 4: 'Could we have a little more role playing?', 5: '24'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hmph, now the first Demon General won't escape our hands.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Role playing? Talk to me about role playing after those traps can one-hit kill us.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'I quickly passed the corridor full of (triggered) traps. There was a loud noise behind me.'}
{3: 'The corridor and all the other passages were closed, locking us inside this hall—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'And more enemies who come out of nowhere.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Alright, let's go then!", 4: '2'}
